thought: I feel stuck every time I gain momentum. It’s like my progress triggers my resistance.
response: This recurring feeling may signal a subconscious self-sabotage loop. Let’s explore what you're protecting by staying stuck.

thought: When I’m with others, I mirror them so much I forget what I feel.
response: You may be prioritizing relational safety over self-expression. Your awareness of this is the first step to integration.
